headline.main: NEW-YORK ACADEMY OF MEDICINE.; The National Hotel Endemic--Radical Cure of Hernia--Preservative of Vaccine Virus--Milk Sickness of the West as Affecting the Meat of New-York.

docs.lead_paragraph: The regular monthly meeting of the New-York Academy of Medicine was held at the University on Wednesday evening last, Dr. MOTT, President, in theChair.
docs.abstract: Discussed in the Academy of Medicine
docs.snippet: The regular monthly meeting of the New-York Academy of Medicine was held at the University on Wednesday evening last, Dr. MOTT, President, in theChair.

headline.main: EUROPE.; Americans in Paris--French politics and the Elections--President Buchanan's Appointments, &c, &c. Arrival of the Niagara's Mails. AFFAIRS IN FRANCE. The mails from Europe by the Niagara, at Boston, reached the City last evening. Our latestdates from London are to June 19.

docs.lead_paragraph: * * Senator SUMNER left here this morning for London. The voyage was of service to him, but after his arrival he became much worse and for some weeks seemed likely to suffer a serious relapse. finder the advice of his physicians he started upon a tour through the South of France, and traveled a good deal on horseback among the, Pyrenees,which he found exceedingly beneficial,
docs.abstract: Lond Times on the career of Walker

headline.main: A New Phase of the Dalton Case--Strange Developments--Personal Racounter.

docs.lead_paragraph: Alleged Bribery in the Brooklyn Board of Health. Alderman KALBFLEISCH, Chairman of a Special Committee of the Brooklyn Aldermen, appointed to investigate alleged corruption in the Board of Health, made a lengthy report on Monday evening. The report in effect is that Alderman PRESTIN had received improperly $250, from Mr. DE BURGH,

docs.lead_paragraph: DUTIES OF THE HEALTH WARDENS.--Each Warden is required by the City Inspector to report himself daily at the Bureau of Saitary Inspection between 9 o'clock A. M. and 12 M. and report what has been his action the day previous, and receive such complaints as may have been made at the office,and immediately examine the same.

docs.lead_paragraph: CORPORATION CORRUPTION IN BROOKLYN.- Our neighbors across the East River appear to be ambitious of emulating the example of New-York in the matter of Corporation cor ruptions, but on a rather reduced scale, as be comes the size of the place.
